title: Cordial HD  Watch Face
summary: Cordial is a magnificent watch face for Moto 360,LG G Watch R & others

Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Cordial Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A10

Category
Decent

Product description

Cordial Watch Face is an coolest watch face for all smart watches, a decent modest design which is amusing and engaging (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. . it has customization feature which allows you to change. it has following features

 square & round watches support
 ambient modes pack
 Smooth & Tick Needles
 Date
 Unlimited Colors Theme
 Custom Ambient Mode

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
 square & round watches support
 ambient modes pack
 Smooth & Tick Needles
 Date
 Unlimited Colors Theme
 Custom Ambient Mode
Configuration:
 choose your favorite ambient mode
 Turn on/off Date Display
 choose your favorite color
 change needle style (Smooth/Tick)

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Cordial Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Rubbish I thought It looked nice but it constantly crashes and doesn't respond.
Intrusive begging for a good rating Multiple times during the day on my phone even when you are NOT using the watch face annoyed me enough to uninstall and give it a krappy rating.
Very Decent Too much customization with elegant design
